channel.title: Webserver and Create Character, need help
channel.description:
Ok im coding a webserver to run with the private server. And I want to make a form so you can create a character. I got something but i dont know how to add it so it converts the password the md5. It also adds &userlookup= to the password. [code=java] out.println("Register
"+ "Username: "+ "
Password: "+ "
"+ "
"+ "
");[/code]

item.title: Webserver and Create Character, need help
item.dc:creator: @tipsyhitman tipsyhitman
item.description:
@tipsyhitman wrote:

Ok im coding a webserver to run with the private server. And I want to make a form so you can create a character.
I got something but i dont know how to add it so it converts the password the md5. It also adds &userlookup= to the password.

out.println("<b>Register</b><form action='/' method=register>"+ "Username: <input type=text name=username maxlength=12>"+ "<br>Password: <input type=password name=password maxlength=20>"+ "<input type=submit value=Register><br>"+ "<br>"+ "<br>");

Read full topic
item.source: Webserver and Create Character, need help
